verses.verse: שִׁמְע֞וּ <WH8085> Hear אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this word הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> hath spoken יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> that the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> against בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> against you O children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel עַ֚ל <WH5921> against כָּל־ <WH3605> the entire הַמִּשְׁפָּחָ֔ה <WH4940> against the whole family אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which הֶעֱלֵ֛יתִי <WH5927> which I brought up מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> from the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

רַ֚ק <WH7535> but אֶתְכֶ֣ם <WH853> יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> You only have I known מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <WH4940> of all the families הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> of the earth עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that אֶפְקֹ֣ד <WH6485> therefore I will punish עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> and אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> for all עֲוֹנֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5771> you for all your iniquities
הֲיֵלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> walk שְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> Can two יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together בִּלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> except אִם־ <WH518> lo נוֹעָֽדוּ׃ <WH3259> they be agreed

הֲיִשְׁאַ֤ג <WH7580> roar אַרְיֵה֙ <WH738> Will a lion בַּיַּ֔עַר <WH3293> in the forest וְטֶ֖רֶף <WH2964> leaf אֵ֣ין <WH369> has ל֑וֹ הֲיִתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> add כְּפִ֤יר <WH3715> lion קוֹלוֹ֙ <WH6963> aloud מִמְּעֹ֣נָת֔וֹ <WH4585> of his den בִּלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> because אִם־ <WH518> lo לָכָֽד׃ <WH3920> if he have taken

הֲתִפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> fall צִפּוֹר֙ <WH6833> Can a bird עַל־ <WH5921> into פַּ֣ח <WH6341> in a snare הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth וּמוֹקֵ֖שׁ <WH4170> where no gin אֵ֣ין <WH369> there לָ֑הּ הֲיַֽעֲלֶה־ <WH5927> [is] for him? shall [one] take up פַּח֙ <WH6341> a snare מִן־ <WH4480> from הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> from the earth וְלָכ֖וֹד <WH3920> and have taken לֹ֥א <WH3808> nothing יִלְכּֽוֹד׃ <WH3920> nothing at all

אִם־ <WH518> If יִתָּקַ֤ע <WH8628> be blown שׁוֹפָר֙ <WH7782> Shall a trumpet בְּעִ֔יר <WH5892> in the city וְעָ֖ם <WH5971> and the people לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יֶחֱרָ֑דוּ <WH2729> not be afraid אִם־ <WH518> If תִּהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> occurs רָעָה֙ <WH7451> ? shall there be evil בְּעִ֔יר <WH5892> in a city וַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD לֹ֥א <WH3808> not עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> hath not done

כִּ֣י <WH3588> Surely לֹ֧א <WH3808> not יַעֲשֶׂ֛ה <WH6213> will do אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> Surely the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3069> GOD דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> nothing כִּ֚י <WH3588> Surely אִם־ <WH518> lo גָּלָ֣ה <WH1540> but he revealeth סוֹד֔וֹ <WH5475> his secret אֶל־ <WH413> to his עֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> unto his servants הַנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <WH5030> the prophets

אַרְיֵ֥ה <WH738> The lion שָׁאָ֖ג <WH7580> hath roared מִ֣י <WH4310> Who לֹ֣א <WH3808> who will not יִירָ֑א <WH3372> fear אֲדֹנָ֤י <WH136> ? the Lord יְהוִה֙ <WH3068> GOD דִּבֶּ֔ר <WH1696> hath spoken מִ֖י <WH4310> Who לֹ֥א <WH3808> but יִנָּבֵֽא׃ <WH5012> who can but prophesy

הַשְׁמִ֙יעוּ֙ <WH8085> Publish עַל־ <WH5921> on אַרְמְנ֣וֹת <WH759> in the palaces בְּאַשְׁדּ֔וֹד <WH795> at Ashdod וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> and on אַרְמְנ֖וֹת <WH759> and in the palaces בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְאִמְר֗וּ <WH559> and say הֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ <WH622> Assemble עַל־ <WH5921> on הָרֵ֣י <WH2022> yourselves upon the mountains שֹׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria וּרְא֞וּ <WH7200> and behold מְהוּמֹ֤ת <WH4103> tumults רַבּוֹת֙ <WH7227> the great בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> in the midst וַעֲשׁוּקִ֖ים <WH6217> thereof and the oppressed בְּקִרְבָּֽהּ׃ <WH7130> in the midst

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָדְע֥וּ <WH3045> For they know עֲשׂוֹת־ <WH6213> not to do נְכֹחָ֖ה <WH5229> right נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD הָאֽוֹצְרִ֛ים <WH686> who store חָמָ֥ס <WH2555> up violence וָשֹׁ֖ד <WH7701> and robbery בְּאַרְמְנֽוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH759> in their palaces פ

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD צַ֖ר <WH6862> An adversary וּסְבִ֣יב <WH5439> [there shall be] even round about הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land וְהוֹרִ֤ד <WH3381> and he shall bring down מִמֵּךְ֙ <WH4480> at עֻזֵּ֔ךְ <WH5797> thy strength וְנָבֹ֖זּוּ <WH962> shall be spoiled אַרְמְנוֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <WH759> from thee and thy palaces

כֹּה֮ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after יַצִּ֨יל <WH5337> taketh out הָרֹעֶ֜ה <WH7462> As the shepherd מִפִּ֧י <WH6310> of the mouth הָאֲרִ֛י <WH738> of the lion שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> two כְרָעַ֖יִם <WH3767> legs א֣וֹ <WH176> or בְדַל־ <WH915> or a piece אֹ֑זֶן <WH241> of an ear כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> So יִנָּצְל֞וּ <WH5337> be taken out בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> so shall the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel הַיֹּֽשְׁבִים֙ <WH3427> that dwell בְּשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <WH8111> in Samaria בִּפְאַ֥ת <WH6285> in the corner מִטָּ֖ה <WH4296> of a bed וּבִדְמֶ֥שֶׁק <WH1833> and in Damascus עָֽרֶשׂ׃ <WH6210> [in] a couch

שִׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> Hear וְהָעִ֖ידוּ <WH5749> ye and testify בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יַֽעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> of Jacob נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3069> GOD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> the God הַצְּבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

כִּ֗י <WH3588> on בְּי֛וֹם <WH3117> That in the day פָּקְדִ֥י <WH6485> that I shall visit פִשְׁעֵֽי־ <WH6588> the transgressions יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וּפָֽקַדְתִּי֙ <WH6485> upon him I will also visit עַל־ <WH5921> and מִזְבְּח֣וֹת <WH4196> the altars בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <WH1008> of Bethel וְנִגְדְּעוּ֙ <WH1438> shall be cut off קַרְנ֣וֹת <WH7161> and the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> of the altar וְנָפְל֖וּ <WH5307> and fall לָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> to the ground

וְהִכֵּיתִ֥י <WH5221> And I will smite בֵית־ <WH1004> house הַחֹ֖רֶף <WH2779> the winter עַל־ <WH5921> and בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַקָּ֑יִץ <WH7019> with the summer וְאָבְד֞וּ <WH6> shall perish בָּתֵּ֣י <WH1004> and the houses הַשֵּׁ֗ן <WH8127> of ivory וְסָפ֛וּ <WH5486> shall have an end בָּתִּ֥ים <WH1004> houses רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> and the great נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס
